testSteps.description: Given Sarah has a Caffeinate-Me account

And the following prices:
| Product | Price |
| regular cappuccino | 1.90 |
| large cappuccino | 2.25 |
| muffin | 1.25 |

children.description: Add products with prices: [ProductPrice{product='regular cappuccino', price=1.9}, ProductPrice{product='large cappuccino', price=2.25}, ProductPrice{product='muffin', price=1.25}]

testSteps.description:
Given Sarah has ordered:
| Quantity | Product |
| 1 | large cappuccino |
| 2 | muffin |

children.description: Customer places an order for 1 large cappuccino
Place order for customer 1 for 1 x large cappuccino
Customer places an order for 2 muffin
Place order for customer 1 for 2 x muffin

testSteps.description: When she asks for a receipt

Then she should receive a receipt totalling:
| Subtotal | Service Fee | Total |
| 4.75 | 0.24 | 4.99 |

And the receipt should contain the line items:
| Product | Quantity | Price |
| large cappuccino | 1 | 2.25 |
| muffin | 2 | 2.50 |

featureTag.name: Order coffee remotely/Ask for a receipt

Order coffee remotely
tags.displayName: We think that allowing our regular customers to order coffees ahead of time and avoid waiting in a queue will increase sales to regular customers
